vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract for an increase in the contract with Innovative Emergency Management for an expansion of scope upgrading the regional tabletop exercise to a regional functional exercise - Not to exceed $122,244.00, from $491,219.00 to $613,463.00 - Financing: FY2021 Regional Catastrophic Preparedness Grant Program Fund
